long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bismillah, Haram Guard Extension - Version 3 Haram Guard dynamically blurs images, videos, SVGs, specific divs, iframes, background images, and specific links on webpages. With the latest update, Version 3, we've introduced several enhancements and resolved technical issues to improve your browsing experience. Key Features: Dynamic Blur: Automatically blurs all visual content, ensuring you browse with ease and focus. Whitelist Feature: Allows you to whitelist specific domains, providing flexibility and control over where the blur effect is applied. Improved Performance: Resolved several technical issues to ensure a smoother and more reliable experience. User-Friendly Interface: A beautifully designed popup with options for managing your whitelist . Experience a distraction-free browsing environment with Haram Guard.
